modName: Ring of Solus - No Spell Cost
descriptionHtml:
Just a little ring you throw on to remove the cost of spells...

might make your game feel dull so only add it if you really feel like you this might be something you like.

I have not added it anywhere so...
if you wanna get it simply use console commands

type: "Help Solus"

look for ARMO

then type: "player.additem [ID#] 1"

I will most likely add other rings (with a location to find them)
so that instead of removing costs for ALL spells.
you can decide what spell classes you want free.
author: 2Low
